sections.title: Error: steam.exe Popup
sections.text: Caused by GeForce Now or Shadow PC—restart your PC and redo injection if not applicable.

sections.title: Error: User Couldn't Be Found
sections.text: Verify registration on the HX panel; contact support if issue persists.

sections.title: Error: No User Found with HWID
sections.text: Provide your key and user in a ticket and await support.

sections.title: Error: Limit Reached
sections.text: Max HWID resets used—wait for support assistance.

sections.title: Error: ntdll.dll
sections.text:
1. Open FiveM without HX.
2. Set screentype to Fullscreen.
3. Delete data, crashes, and logs folders in FiveM Application Data.
4. Reinject—or contact support if unresolved.

sections.title: Error: Instaban
sections.text:
1. Change menu key to something discreet.
2. Disable 'Block Game Input' in config.
3. Avoid rage/exploit features.
4. Reinject—or contact support if unresolved.
